Name: SPITE
About the game: SPITE is a wave based survival game. The waves go up to 100! If you can pass wave 100, you have beat one of the levels. There are currently 8 levels to choose from. All sorts of ammo, health and bomb spawns, and weapons to choose from throughout the maps. Health does increase over time. SPITE is set in a world with zombies and monsters coming at you from everywhere!
